items.question: What kind of enhancements can I expect?
items.answer: AI Face Enhancement can provide smooth skin, sharpened features, and adjustments to lighting and tones, all while keeping a natural look. Our technology excels in delivering results that enhance rather than alter your photos.

items.question: Can I customize the enhancement level?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can select from quick touch-ups to deep retouch options, allowing you to control how subtle or dramatic the enhancements are, tailored to your specific needs.

items.question: What image formats work best for enhancement?
items.answer: We recommend using high-resolution JPG or PNG files. For optimal results, images should be clear and well-lit, ideally above 800x800 pixels. However, most common formats are supported.

items.question: How is this different from manual retouching?
items.answer: The AI technology provides instant results with consistent quality, unlike manual retouching which can be time-consuming and may vary in quality. AI enhancements offer a quick and reliable solution for improved images.

items.question: Can I apply effects to multiple photos at once?
items.answer: Yes! Our batch processing tool allows you to enhance multiple images simultaneously, making it efficient for larger projects or events.

items.question: What rights do I have after enhancement?
items.answer: You own the commercial rights to all enhanced images created through our service without additional fees. Use them as you please across various platforms.

items.question: How long does the enhancement process take?
items.answer: The generation time is swift, usually under 2 minutes per image. You'll see your enhanced results in no time.

items.question: What types of photography can benefit from AI enhancements?
items.answer: AI Face Enhancement is perfect for portraits, commercial photography, social media images, and any context where visual appeal is crucial to success.

items.question: Do I need to credit WaveSpeed when using enhanced images?
items.answer: No attribution is required, but we appreciate crediting our service if you wish! Your enhanced images can be used freely across any media.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support through detailed guides, video tutorials, and a responsive team ready to assist you via email or chat for any technical difficulties.
